message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. What do you say?
You're starting high, I'll try to meet you in the middle!
Meet me in the middle, Bob! This is a fair split.
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'll try to squeeze a bit more out of this!
Getting closer, Bob! This is a more reasonable split.
It's time to meet in the middle, Alice. Let's call it a day!
